title: Factory Fire
flavor: Burning fuel stores send black smoke across the district.
ruleText: All industrial hexes cost +1 MP to enter this turn.

title: Communication Delay
flavor: Field telephone lines severed by shellfire.
ruleText: Active faction loses 1 CP this turn.

title: Commando Raid
flavor: A bold reconnaissance-in-force probes deep behind the lines.
ruleText: All friendly recon units gain +1 vision range this turn.

title: Ammunition Shortage
flavor: Supply trucks hit on the approach roads.
ruleText: Active faction loses 1 artillery point this turn.

title: Morning Fog
flavor: Dense Volga fog blankets the riverbank at dawn.
ruleText: All units' vision range reduced by 1 this turn (minimum 1).

title: Air Support
ruleText: Active faction's next attack this turn gets +2 combat bonus.

title: Supply Convoy
flavor: Fresh supplies reach the front under cover of darkness.
ruleText: Active faction gains +2 CP this turn.

title: Sniper Team
flavor: A crack marksman disrupts enemy command.
ruleText: Choose one visible enemy unit: it becomes Disrupted.

title: Political Pressure
ruleText: Active faction must attack this turn or lose 1 VP.

title: Counter-Battery Fire
flavor: Enemy gun positions located and silenced.

title: Engineers Forward
flavor: Pioneer squads clear rubble and lay paths.
ruleText: City hex movement cost reduced by 1 (min 1) for active faction this turn.

title: Night Assault
flavor: Under cover of darkness, units slip past the enemy.
ruleText: Active faction's units ignore ZOC for movement this turn.

title: Reserves Arrive
flavor: A fresh detachment is committed to the battle.
ruleText: Active faction's weakest unit recovers 2 strength (up to max).
